tool_description: This API checks the genuineness of the CA membership, ensuring that the Chartered Accountant is registered and recognized by the Institute of Chartered Accountants of India (ICAI).

api_list.name: Fetch Verification Result
api_list.description: Used to fetch the API result using the request ID received in previous responses.

required_parameters.name: request_id
required_parameters.description: The unique identifier for the verification request.

api_list.name: Verify CA Membership
api_list.description: This API checks the genuineness of the CA membership. Use the GET Call in the bundle to fetch the result of the request ID received in the response.
